description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Toffee Apple Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit pudding,Pescatarian,Christmas,Soy free,Apple,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegan Toffee Apple Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine apple, golden syrup, lemon juice and 1 tsp salt flakes in a large heavy-based baking dish. Bake for 45 minutes or until apple softens and caramelises slightly. Transfer to a bowl and refrigerate until required.
Meanwhile, to make the crumble, combine all ingredients in a bowl, rubbing in margarine until crumbly. Refrigerate until required.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Combine egg replacer with 1/2 cup water in a bowl and set aside.

Using electric beaters, beat margarine, sugar and vanilla in a bowl until thick and pale. Stir in egg replacer mixture. Add flour and coconut cream, mixing to combine. Transfer batter to an 8-cup ovenproof dish, add apple mixture and swirl through batter using a skewer. Scatter crumble over and bake for 1 hour or until just cooked through. Remove from oven and drizzle with 2 tbs extra golden syrup. Return to oven for 15 minutes or until golden. Scatter over coconut flakes, drizzle over remaining golden syrup and serve with extra coconut cream.
